waste_details.reason_for_no_provision: THIS PROPOSAL A SMALL SIDE EXTENTENSION TO BE ADD TO THE EXISTING PREMISES TO GAIN EXTRE SPACE TO THE BUSINESS.

description: Single storey side extension to ground floor retail shop (following demolition of existing structure)
subdivision_of_building:
DEAR SIRS,
THE PROPOSAL OF SIDE EXTENSION WILL BE JUST ON THE SIDE EXISTING PREMESES.
decision_conditions: The existing side extension, that is the subject of Enforcement Notice 20EN1243, shall be removed within 6 months of the date of this notice. Failing this, this permission will lapse and have no effect. The proposed extension, to which this permission relates, shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years of the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: TP/613/01: PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS; TP/613/02: EXISTING AND PROPOSED SITE PLANS; TP/613/03:EXISTING FLOOR PLAN;TP/613/04:EXISTING ELEVATIONS;TP/613/05:PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS; TP/613/06:PROPOSED ELEVATIONS; Title deed drawing

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Notwithstanding any information submitted with this application, details of the materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development hereby approved is commenced. Details should show the proposed extension as a solid structure that is made of concrete or brick. The details shall be fully implemented as approved.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1 (h), 1.2 (g) and 2.10 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), and policy D4 of the London Plan (2021).
